Wisdom: أَشَدُّ النَّاسِ نَدَامَةً وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ مَلَامَةً الْعَجِلُ النَّزِقُ الَّذِي لَا يُدْرِكُهُ عَقْلُهُ إِلَّا بَعْدَ فَوْتِ أَمْرِهِ
enWisdom: Of all people, the one with the greatest regret and the most reproof is the hasty, rash person who is not subdued by his intellect until after his affair is lost
Everyone who is hastened asks for more time
A hasty person never gets praised [for his haste]

Wisdom: مِنَ الْخُرْقِ الْعَجَلَةُ قَبْلَ الْإِمْكَانِ وَالْأَنَاةُ بَعْدَ إِصَابَةِ الْفُرْصَةِ
enWisdom: It is from ineptness to make haste before [having] ability, and to act slowly after getting the opportunity
Being hasty before [possessing the] ability is part of foolishness

Wisdom: لَا تَسْتَعْجِلُوا بِمَا لَمْ يُعَجِّلْهُ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ
enWisdom: Do not make haste in that which Allah has not hastened for you

Wisdom: لَا تُسْرِعَنَّ إِلَى بَادِرَةٍ وَجَدْتَ عَنْهَا مَنْدُوحَةً
enWisdom: Never be quick to punish when there is an alternative
